events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but I want to return it because the size doesn't fit and I would like a refund.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to sizing problems with the jacket order.
Assigning this refund case to agent Sarah in refund department to assist the customer promptly.
Hello! I'm Sarah and I'll be helping you with your refund request for the jacket you ordered.
Please provide your order number and confirm that the jacket is unused and still has all original tags.
My order number is 123456789. The jacket is unused, and all tags are still attached as when I received it.
Thank you for the information. You can return the jacket using our prepaid label, and we will process your refund within 5 business days after receipt.
That sounds great, thank you for your quick help! I'll send the jacket back today.
I've emailed you the prepaid return label and instructions. Please let us know once the package is shipped.
We are following up to check if you have successfully shipped the jacket and if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I shipped the jacket yesterday. I look forward to receiving the refund soon.
Your refund has been processed successfully and should appear on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your experience with our refund service. Your feedback is appreciated.
I completed the survey and was very satisfied with how the refund process was handled. Thanks!
Closing the refund case as resolved. Thank you for your cooperation and have a wonderful day!
